name: 郭志宇　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: A brief introduction of general chemistry and chemical reactions, covering atomic structure and bonding, quantitative chemistry, gas, thermodynamics, kinetics, etc. In addition to the basic principles of chemistry, this course will focus on letting students understand the relationship between chemistry and daily life.
schedule:
Week/Topic
1    Instruction/Introduction of Chemistry
2    Measurements and Calculations in Chemistry
3    Measurements and Calculations in Chemistry 
4    Chemical Foundations
5    Atomic Structure and Periodicity
6    Atomic Structure and Periodicity
7    Bonding: General
8    Bonding: General
9    Molecular Structure and Orbitals
10  Molecular Structure and Orbitals
11  Stoichiometry
12  Stoichiometry
13  Types of Chemical Reactions and Solution Stoichiometry
14  Types of Chemical Reactions and Solution Stoichiometry
15  Gases
16  Gases
17 Liquid and Solids
18  Final Exam
materials: Chemistry, An Atoms First Approach, 3th Edition, Steven S. Zumdahl, Susan A. Zumdahl, and Donald J. DeCoste (滄海圖書)
